name: Mega Milk Story
description:
[Note: Mega Milk Story is the official English localization of ちちうし物語, originally developed by SUGAR STAR. ]

Through cuddles, headpats, and exercise, help Hanako produce lots of delicious milk to use for healing in battle... or to sell on the open market for huge profit! With the unique dual protagonist system, play as George the rancher and build up your ranch, or hand control over to Erin the female mercenary to explore challenging dungeons and difficult bosses. But be careful: the dungeons are full of dangerous creatures out to get her!

You start the game drowning in debt, a disgraced noble in a world of aristocracy and privilege. Will you charm your way back into the upper class? Will your heart reach out to those who struggle to even survive? Or will you disregard this all, and become a titan of industry by creating through competitions and training the most famous and capable Chichi ever?

Although Chichi appear human-like, they are primarily kept for their milk production. Chichi owners can, for a fee, compete on a national level at Chichi Competitions. There, they send their Chichi to compete in beauty, skill, and talent. Those who do well are rewarded with prizes and fame. But more important than prizes is rank. A higher rank is a great honor for a Chichi trainer, and the highest ranked Chichi can produce the ultra valuable Mega Milk.

Can you, through diligence, energy, and a sparkle of fate, capture your favorite girl's heart and find wealth and fame?





GeorgeOur heroic protagonist and the victim of outrageous misfortune. Can he turn his life around and find the love he dreams of?


CharlotteA young noble and George's former fiance. She tends to spend money a bit recklessly.


HanakoA young Chichi recently purchased by Charlotte.


ErinA mercenary from a poor family just trying to get by.


VictoriaThe experienced young lady in charge of the mercenaries and a treasure trove of knowledge.


MinutesThe friendly local shopkeeper and your go-to source for all household improvements.


LucretCharlotte's faithful assistant and the gatekeeper of her estate.








  • Action-based dungeon-crawling with difficult boss battles
  • Crafting system with 100+ craftable items
  • Build up your Chichi Ranch: Farming, Mining, Fishing, Beekeeping, Pets, and more!
  • Multiple Endings
  • Immersive Characters and Story
  • Optional plot-heavy prologue
  • Coming Soon: Steam Achievements

And a content update available from the original developer that adds a new Training System for Hanako, new ways to power up in dungeon battles, over 50 New Unique CGs, and much more.
